attributes.additional_details: I recently reported an incident to my insurance company where i did not claim on my account. Yet my insurance renewal quote was more than quadrupled in price because of this. I would like to put a stop to this happeneing to other drivers.
attributes.background: Car insurance companies keep charging extortionate prices. The price of car insurance is barely affordable, and if you dare to make a claim or report and incident even if you dont claim the price of your insurance goes up anyway. I would like to put a cap on how much they are aloud to charge.
